titleStmt.title: By the commissioners of the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England, for ordering and managing affairs in Scotland the parliament of the Common-vvealth of England, having declared their intentions concerning the settlement of Scotland, and appointed us, their commissioners, to publish and make known the same to the people of this nation ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. Commissioners for Ordering and Managing Affairs in Scotland.
